name: FormLabel
description: The FormLabel component represents a caption for all sorts of HTML elements in a user interface.

props.name: forId
props.doc: the same unique `id` like the linked HTML element has.

props.name: text
props.doc: the `text` of the label. You can use `children` as well.

props.name: srOnly
props.doc: when `true`, the label will be invisible and only accessible for screen readers.

props.name: vertical
props.doc: if set to `true`, will do the same as `label_direction` when set to **vertical**.

props.name: size
props.doc: define one of the following [heading sizes](/uilib/elements/heading/): `medium` or `large`.

props.name: skeleton
props.doc: If set to `true`, an overlaying skeleton with animation will be shown.

props.name: disabled
props.doc: if set to `true`, the label will behave as not interactive.

props.name: element
props.doc: defines the HTML element used. Defaults to `label`.

props.name: innerRef
props.doc: attach a React Ref to the inner label `element`.
